data.description:
Step into the future of English reading education with ReadQuest, an innovative VR training experience that redefines how we learn to read. Rooted in evidence-supported Phonics methodology, this app leverages AI and 3D technology to revolutionize reading proficiency acquisition. Through captivating interactions and immersive 3D environments, students engage with the curriculum like never before, decoding letter sounds and mastering reading skills in an exciting virtual world. Guided by an AI-based teacher avatar, learners receive personalized feedback and analysis, ensuring targeted practice and continuous improvement. Whether you're just starting out or aiming to enhance your reading abilities, ReadQuest caters to learners at every stage, fostering a love for reading that lasts a lifetime. But that's not all—ReadQuest's Teacher Mode offers educators unlimited, realistic self-practice simulations, empowering them to master the Phonics methodology and prepare for classroom instruction with confidence.

Developed by the Fugees Family, a US-based non-profit dedicated to educational justice for refugee and immigrant youth, in collaboration with Foretell Reality, a leading Virtual Reality platform company, ReadQuest is more than just an app—it's a transformative tool that inspires curiosity, learning, and endless possibilities.
